TopicTitle: Any mods that change from Kerbal scale to human scale?

Articles.Content: Not like RSS, I mean rescaling the actual parts so that crew cabins are more than 1m tall. I want the parts to be big enough to actually accommodate a human crew. Are there any mods that do this?
There's tweakscale, which lets you scale up and down parts. Not sure if that's what you're looking for but the closest I can think of.
Realism Overhaul scales the parts so the rockets are the correct height (and does a lot more changes)
